TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, I don't have a better explanation. 

I wish that people noticed MY NUMBER OF POSTS TO REP IS OVER 15!

Granted, but you shall be punished for it.

 

I wish I had something better to do right now

Granted, it's do a Dres awareness mission. 

I wish I could come up with better wishes.

granted, but they still suck.

I wish I hadn't posted in the wrong thread accidentally and then had to quickly edit in something to make it fit here.

Edited April 22, 2016 by EliasDanger
Not granted, because you did.

Due to a lack of a wish, I will just say you are sucked into an inter-dimensional fissure!

I wish that people would stop using : ) as a smiley face.

Granted, but this is what they use instead: 37y29843oe659f2y6tr3h97p0tq6y3h

 

I wish for KasperVld to fuse with Kuzzter.

Not granted, because announcing 1.1 and Kerbulus do not mix. 

I wish that you were not top heavy.

you granted with a wich not a wishe

i wich for witch wishe ... oh well i want 4 that make only 3

Edited April 23, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted?... 

I wish that the next person to respond was a moderater.

Hmmm...granted.  Unfortunately, that moderator is a time-traveling KSP member who was sent from the future to prevent this game from destroying civilization, and has identified this as the moment where all moderation must be stopped in order to complete their mission.  

I wish that I had an anit-gravity bouncy castle.

Granted, but since a normal bouncy castle can technically be described as "anti-gravity", because you are being bounced up against gravity, you get a normal bouncy castle.

I wish I knew the future

Granted, but because of the infinity of possible multiverses for any given outcome you are driven mad as you see every one of them at once.

I wish I had a better computer.

Granted, your new computer is way better at crushing pinecones.

I wish I had sanic fast recognition for 4x4 edge pairs.

Sorry. Not granted. 

I wish I was even sanic faster at posting.

Granted, but you are then banned from the forums.

 

I wish @max_creative posted less.

Sorry. I'm here to ruin your wish with my over poster badge. 

I wish there were more 1.1 YouTube videos.

Granted. LeafyisHere, Pyrocynical, and h3h3 all make rants about how the new version sucks.

I wish my father gave me a small loan of a million dollars...

Granted, after you go fix your hair. It looks like a birds nest! 

I wish people actually made GOOD wishes.

Granted, but you will never be one of them.

 

I wish I could get a real wish granted for realz.

Granted. Your wish is summoning Satan.

I wish real life was like a comedy show.

Granted. It's a Chevy Chase nonstop marathon.

I wish for lots and lots of chocolate.

Your wish is granted but Willy Wonka demands you live in his factory as an Opmpah Lumpah!

I wish for... ??

Granted, it's 42.

I wish to possess all knowledge of all time.
Granted, but your puny human brain can't absorb it all and you explode all Indiana-Jones-and-the-Crystal-Skull style.
